info.description:
This is a flow swagger API documentation.  You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net,
        #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).  For this sample, you can use the api key
        `special-key` to test the authorization filters.
info.title: Negotium Swagger API Documentation

tags.name: user
tags.description: All the user api endpoints are defined under this tag

post.description: Logs user into the system and returns a sanctum bearer token

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The user email address or username

example.message: Example: Wrong email or password provided

email: The email field must be a valid email address.

post.description: Logs user out of the system
This can only be done by the logged in user.
